code: import React,{useState,useContext}from"react";import{useContextAuth}from"../../contexts/AuthContext";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import'../../styles/pages/ProfilePage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfilePage=()=>{const{user,logout}=useContextAuth();const[isChangePasswordVisible,setIsChangePasswordVisible]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleChangePasswordClick=()=>{setIsChangePasswordVisible(true);navigate("/change-password");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Profile"}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Email: ",user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:logout,children:"Log Out"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:isChangePasswordVisible?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"New Password"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleChangePasswordClick,children:"Change Password"})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Not logged in"})]});};export default ProfilePage;
